title: Health Minister condemns blasts in Hangu, Mastung
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 29 (APP): Caretaker Federal Minister for Health Dr. Nadeem Jan strongly condemned the blasts in Hangu and Mastung.
According to spokesperson of the Ministry of Health, the minister expressed sympathies and condolences to the families of those killed in the blast.
He prayed, “May Allah Almighty give patience to the bereaved family.”
Dr. Nadeem Jan said that the government is ensuring the provision of the best medical facilities to the people injured in the blast.
He directed the administration of PIMS and Polyclinic hospitals to be on early alert in case of shifting patients.
He also instructed to take advance measures in case of bringing the injured to PIMS and Polyclinic hospital.
He assured that if patients are shifted to PIMS and Polyclinic hospitals, best medical facilities will be ensured.
Both the hospitals are ensuring all necessary measures in this regard, he added.
Dr. Nadeem Jan said, “We will provide best care to the injured in this difficult time.”
